entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-07-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Suppress No Longer Showing in Error List #74228
    Backlog
  • Partial properties needs to enforce that all implementation part accessors have bodies #74221
    17.12
  • Go To Definition on external package only works as expected the very first time #74220
  • IDE0059 is not raised inside a code block with using keyword. #74219
    Backlog

Closed

  • "Use collection expression" code fix drops comments in certain cases #73740
    Backlog
  • CS0266 suggests invalid code fix #56141
    Backlog
  • IDE0161 - Convert to file-scoped namespace reported on files with global namespace type declarations #74214
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Set intermediate path sooner #74229
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Escape `record` keywords #74227
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Dispose various locations using PEReader #74226
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Report a diagnostic on missing body in partial property implementation #74224
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Partial Properties
  • Syntax formatting options #74223
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Remove fallback options for SimplifierOptions #74222
    Area-IDE, untriaged

Merged

  • Preserve trivia for 'Use Collection Expression' fixer in more cases #74052
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Fix issue with 'use explicit cast' and compound assignments #74225
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Add analyzer/fixer to move people over to System.Threading.Lock #74170
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Escaping also considers record structs #74125
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged, Next
  • MetadataAsSource options #74212
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Doc Cookbook Auto Interface Implementation #73906
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Do not offer 'convert' namespace when the ns has sibling types #74216
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.11 to main #74211
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge 'main' into features/FirstClassSpan #74203
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Overload Resolution Priority #74190
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Feature - Overload Resolution Priority
  • Add tests for consuming instance extension methods from VB and previous version of C# compiler. #74182
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Language Feature - Roles
  • Add LanguageVersion for C# 13 #74215
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Search fewer projects when looking for linked documents #73939
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Parse `field` and `value` as contextual keywords #73947
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Display lifted primary constructor parameters in watch window … #74188
    Area-Interactive, untriaged
  • Ensure that when EnC finishes that it disposes the OOP connection it is holding onto #73465
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Remove fallbacks - 1 of n #74041
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Make project system workspace transformation functions resilient to being attempted twice #74189
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Ignore user-defined Span conversions #74002
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - First-class Span Types
  • New generator apis #74127
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators, untriaged
  • Smart Rename: Provide additional context for renamed symbol #73873
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
